title: 7.5 crash Bugsplat error during Champion loadout

embed.description: Upload and share videos instantly. It's free and simple. No signup required.

body:
Patch 7.5 on Mac OS version 10.10.5 (spare me the flame that I play League on a mac). As seen in the video I linked, the champion loadout screen attempts to load but crashes every single time. Please help!

UPDATE: It turns out the problem is Curse related, I've since closed the Curse application and my game hasn't crashed since. Since Curse is self-updating it must've introduced a major bug to mac users that play League. Looks like it's Discord for now!

replies.body: I've been having this same issue and I think I just figured it out. Disable the in-game overlay (settings -> in-game -> disable) and it should fix it!

Thanks very much! I also have been having this problem for the last few weeks (and wrote back to https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/lEZcFA3j-crash-loading-screen-client-crash-2nd-night-in-a-row). This seems to have fixed it for now.
This is the correct answer! Thank you so much! +1

This exact problem is happening with my friend in his Mac, but he says he sees himself loading up to as high as 50%before crashing... I doubt it's the gfx card though as he has a newer Mac book pro, runs the game at a smooth 60+fps at all times

Is your friend seeing the Bug Splat error (where he can send an error report) or is the champion loading screen crashing without any error message?

If he's seeing the Bug Splat window, have him take a look through the [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to rule out any of those fixes. 

If he's still having issues after that, the next step would be to use the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to grab some logs. If he can submit those logs to us in a ticket, we'll be better able to narrow down the root of the problem.

Hit me up if this was able to help!
Same here. I've tried the beta repair option, reinstalled the whole client, and swapped back to the old client with no change... So frustrating. Probably sent like 100 bugsplat reports haha
I'm with you dude but i'm on windows 7 ultimate and been getting this for months :/

This recently started happening to me too!  It happened JUST this month (March 2017) actually. I do think it might be a Curse issue because I can run League perfectly fine when it's not running along side it.  And you might be right that it could be bugging out mac users because all my friends who don't use mac have no problems what so ever. It's a little frustrating because I only really play league with friends and Curse with them when we do so, so this bugsplat happening really hinders my playing time with them haha. Oh well. :/

Since you're seeing the bug splat at the champion loading screen, it may be due to an out of date graphics driver. Let's make sure that your graphics card has all of its latest updates. If you're still crashing at the loading screen, go through each step in our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#section-mac) and we should be able to narrow down the problem.

Hit me back up if you need any additional help!

Same here loading till 40% then crashing, I played a game before without any issues but in the next one I couldnÂ´t join and for some reason it does not let teammates remake. Does not seem to me to be the Graphics Card.

I am having the same issue!!! I have uninstalled and reinstalled about 3 times now, currently on 4, gone from Beta --> legacy and it worked for 8-12 hours then the issue came again but I was able to get into norms and everything! I then went back to the Beta to no avail then back to the legacy, which seems to work in customs and in ARAM. When I try going into an actual game the issue persists. I have been also updated  my software to OSX 10.11.6 with a graphics Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB. If this patch caused so many graphics cards to be obsolete wouldn't there be a warning of such an issue? I first ran into this issue like 5 days ago, when ever the 7.5 patch was released. It also will not allow for my team to remake, since I have curse running with my friend who is in the game. Due to the issue it has placed me on "Leaver Buster" which is rather annoying since I have done all that I can to, to solve this issue. 

Looking at the loading into the game mode I will sometimes get the loading screen but it usually stays black and will crash sending me a bug splat just recently saying for a brief second or 2 "You have been disconnected check your connection" but I am still able to run everything else that uses the internet just fine. I am at a loss of what to do and looking for any solutions. I also have disabled my firewall and sent a few bug splat tickets but not any with my logs. Where do I retrieve my logs to send in?

EDIT: i was informed by another mac user that it could be due to the Curse update that just hit a little bit ago. I plan on trying going into a game with curse down to see if that will solve the issue. 

EDIT 2: I did close curse and I am able to play without any issues now. CLOSE CURSE that is the way that I have been able to play! If you are one who needs to communicate with party members make sure curse is closed and switch to discord or God forbid Skype.

I have a mac and the exact same problem.  It would crash during loading screen between 20% and 50%.  I did play a support game this morning and it worked fine.  I noticed it happened when i played with friends.  I was able to play one draft pick game and a custom game with no issues.

since I was able to make a custom game earlier, I tried another one after the game crashing repeatedly.  Now that doesn't work.  I've tried games with and without party members and it doesn't matter.     In the more recent games I can't even load a splash art on the loading screen before I crash.  In review, I crashed earlier in the week, had two games work (one custom and one non-ranked draft que), and then later today in the evening it quit working again with constant bug errors.
